ProjectTitle: Discrepancy and Energy on compact Riemannian manifolds
InitialFeedbackHistory: 21/02/2025 [REDACTED] it is more secure to use a storage solution offered by KU [REDACTED] ICTS, please have a look in the storage guide for recommendations: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. [REDACTED] you use github or gitlab for code? https://admin.kuleuven.be/icts/english/research/software/GITLAB [REDACTED] [REDACTED] research data that you generate during your research at KU [REDACTED] needs to remain at KU [REDACTED] for 10 years. [REDACTED] bring them with you when you leave you need to either share it openly so anyone can reuse them, or you need a data transfer agreement. [REDACTED] to assign a persistent identifier to your data you can upload them in RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard
